title: Our List of Allies Grows Thin (3R102)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert a [Sauron] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, add (1) for each ally you can spot.
Lore:	”'The enemy is moving…. His eye is fixed on Rivendell. And Saruman, you tell me, has betrayed us.'”
Rarity:	R
